title: AU Deals: Save Insane Bottlecaps on Fallouts, Plus the Best Prices for Metaphor, Silent Hill 2, and More!
description: Thanks to international Fallout Day, now's the time to V.A.T.S. target some serious savings.
author: Adam Mathew
byline: The Best Gaming Deals In Australia
excerpt: Thanks to international Fallout Day, now's the time to V.A.T.S. target some serious savings.
text: V.A.T.S. some great savings alright.Thanks to international Fallout Day, now's the time to V.A.T.S. target some serious savings of up to 75%. Failing that, I have an update on my Batman: Arkham Shadow situation from yesterday‚Äîgot it, clocked it, and loved it. I probably wouldn't buy a Meta Quest 3 specifically for it, though it'd totally be in my first three game purchases. More pricings, and my full list is here. In retro news, I'm getting my Charizard to light a 26-candle birthday cake for Pok√©mon Red and Blue. These came out right when I started a job in gaming retail. Vividly, I recall picking up a loose cartridge and uttering the fateful words, "Oh, this is that game all of Japan seems to be hooked on...but why?" The next week is an 8-bit blur of me almost getting fired for not serving customers because I had my eyes locked on a Game Boy or my nose buried in the Official Guide. This morning, I was beyond stoked to find that my Blue battery still functions. So here, let me show you my Pokemans...Happy Bday Pok√©mon Red & Blue This Day in Gaming üéÇAussie birthdays for notable games and hardware- Street Fighter II (SNES) 1992. Redux- Forza Motorsport 3 (X360) 2009. eBay- Hotline Miami (PC) 2012. html:
V.A.T.S. some great savings alright.

Thanks to international Fallout Day, now's the time to V.A.T.S. target some serious savings of up to 75%. Failing that, I have an update on my Batman: Arkham Shadow situation from yesterday‚Äîgot it, clocked it, and loved it. I probably wouldn't buy a Meta Quest 3 specifically for it, though it'd totally be in my first three game purchases. More pricings, and my full list is here.

In retro news, I'm getting my Charizard to light a 26-candle birthday cake for Pok√©mon Red and Blue. These came out right when I started a job in gaming retail. Vividly, I recall picking up a loose cartridge and uttering the fateful words, "Oh, this is that game all of Japan seems to be hooked on...but why?" The next week is an 8-bit blur of me almost getting fired for not serving customers because I had my eyes locked on a Game Boy or my nose buried in the Official Guide. This morning, I was beyond stoked to find that my Blue battery still functions. So here, let me show you my Pokemans...

Happy Bday Pok√©mon Red & Blue

This Day in Gaming üéÇ

Aussie birthdays for notable games and hardware

- Street Fighter II (SNES) 1992. Redux

- Pok√©mon Red and Blue (GB) 1998. Redux

- Spyro the Dragon (PS) 1998. Redux

- Dead Space (PC,PS3,X360) 2008. Redux

- Far Cry 2 (PC,PS3,X360) 2008. Get

- Borderlands (PS3,X360) 2009. Redux

- Forza Motorsport 3 (X360) 2009. eBay

- Hotline Miami (PC) 2012. Get

Table of Contents

  • Nintendo Switch
  • PC
  • Xbox
  • PlayStation

Nice Savings for Nintendo Switch

Sonic Mania + Team Racing

Two games for the (heavily discounted) price of one. Sonic Mania is a worthy return to the blue dude‚Äôs classic 2D platforming days. Team Sonic Racing is quite a decent (and potentially three player) kart racer.

  • Sonic X Shadow Generations (-14%) - A$69
  • Pok√©mon: Let‚Äôs Go, Pikachu (-14%) - A$69
  • Final Fantasy I-VI Col (-14%) - A$98
  • Super Mario 3D World (-19%) - A$65
  • Super Mario RPG (-19%) - A$65

Purchase Cheap for PC

Look at your Pip-Boy and see that it overfloweth with savings, like Fallout 76 (77% off - $12.63), Fallout 4 (77% off - $12.73), Fallout Classic Collection (77% off - $6.88), Fallout 3 - Game of the Year Edition (77% off - $6.88) and more.

Exciting Bargains for Xbox

Starfield

This is a mighty big drop for an RPG that got off on the wrong space boot. That being said, and at this price, it's totally worth launching now that it has docked with some patches and DLC while jettisoning some bugs.

  • Sonic X Shadow Generations (-14%) - A$69
  • Transformers: Devastation [Delisted] - A$47.84
  • Star Wars Outlaws (-19%) - A$89.00

Black Myth: Wukong

This is less a bargain and more of a reminder that this is finally available for physical preorder. Amazon is asking $109.95. It‚Äôs actually $99.95 digital. That being said, it‚Äôs a stupidly popular title and who knows what the stock levels will be.
